issue.title: Inertia of certain links is very large

content.raw:
I tweaked the inertia for the initial version as we were building the model.  The model inertias have been updated to the original values provided by BDI for the next release (you can check out the candidate model [here](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/5a41a362b638a1acbc7c718c70f6712d7a778480/models/drc_robot/model.sdf?at=john)).

As for the hand, I am working on getting approximate inertia values for them.
content.html:
I tweaked the inertia for the initial version as we were building the model. The model inertias have been updated to the original values provided by BDI for the next release (you can check out the candidate model here).

As for the hand, I am working on getting approximate inertia values for them.
